div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 16px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 216px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 416px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 616px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 816px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 75px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.span:
异常分发程序：
根据CAUSE寄存器的值
从异常向量组中找到对应
的函数入口，并跳转到
相应中断处理程序

switch.text: 异常分发程序：根据CAUSE寄存器的值...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 275px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.span:
中断处理程序：
通过CAUSE寄存器进一步
判断是由几号中断位引发
的中断，并进入相应的
中断服务函数

switch.text: 中断处理程序：通过CAUSE寄存器进一步...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 120px; margin-left: 475px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.span:
中断服务函数：
响应时钟中断，然后
进入调度程序来调度
新的进程

switch.text: 中断服务函数：响应时钟中断，然后进入调度程序来调度新的进程...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 675px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.span:
进程调度函数：
将用完时间片的进程切换，
并在调度队列中选择新的
就绪进程，最后调用进程
切换函数使其运行

switch.text: 进程调度函数：将用完时间片的进程切换，并在调度队列中选择新的就绪进程，最后调用进程切换函数使其运行...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 875px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.span:
进程切换函数：
将原进程的寄存器状态
保存，并将新进程的寄
存器状态恢复到CPU中
从而实现进程切换

switch.text: 进程切换函数：将原进程的寄存器状态保存，并将新进程的寄存器状态恢复到CPU中...
